markdownRemark.html: Digital Past is an annual two day conference organised by the Royal Commission on the Ancient and Historical Monuments of Wales. It showcases innovative digital technologies and techniques for data capture, interpretation and dissemination of the heritage of Wales, the UK and beyond. For more information on the event, speakers and registration visit: https://rcahmw.gov.uk/about-us/digital-past-conference/
